properties.body:
NORWEGIAN SEA.
NORWAY.
DNC 20, DNC 21.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
   BY M/V POLARCUS ASIMA TOWING 12 9000 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   64-22N 001-25E, 63-53N 004-17E,
   63-18N 004-25E, 62-40N 003-17E,
   62-30N 003-58E, 61-54N 003-00E,
   62-30N 000-14W, 63-07N 000-27W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1193/17.
